title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H3 - Jul 2 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H3 - Jul 2 2022
description:
Secret Service denies Cassidy Hutchinson's hearsay testimony at Jan. 6 show trial. Montage of media reporting Secret Service denial of Hutchinson's testimony. Clay says, "It's inexcusable, it's indefensible, and Republicans I think should almost start their own investigation of the January 6 committee when they win the House." CNN's Jamie Gangel drools over Hutchinson's testimony. Joe Scarborough smears Mark Meadows. Steve Scalise: Dems have nothing to run on but Donald Trump. Buck's necktie poll and the perfectly behaved Travis boys. Fired-up lawyers flood the phone lines. Buck says, "This audience could be arguing in front of the Supreme Court and do very well."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
